name: Space Turtles
description:
You are craving a pizza so bad. But the only way to get one is to transport resources all over the galaxy, obviously. 

So here's the deal. 

  • Accept missions.
  • Gather resources.
  • Upgrade your ship
  • Buy that gosh darn pizza!

Controls:
WASD: Move
E: Interact with stations on your ship
Aim: Mouse
Shoot: Left Mouse Button

Editor (Ship shop) Controls:

Place tiles: :Left Mouse Button
Deselect: Right Mouse Button

This game was made for the Linux Game Jam 2022
